entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing late this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 3 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with rain showers changing to flurries later in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon then northwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High plus 3 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023
